title: 08/31/2021 - HOUR 1 - Cam Newton, Patriots
itunes:title: 08/31/2021 - HOUR 1 - Cam Newton, Patriots
description:
The Patriots have released Cam Newton

Being reliable is very important in New England

Mac Jones played better than expected


Guest: Christian Fauria
